snippet.title: The Descendant : First 10 Minutes of Gameplay
snippet.description:
Get the closest look yet at The Descendant in this video!

You will witness the game’s full introduction, gaining insight into the creepy Ark facilities where humans lie in cryostasis, along with a taste of the backstory and gameplay elements you'll encounter in Episode 1.
